Combat.description: If this trick is enabled, the player may be expected to defeat enemies and bosses with fewer items and less health.

Walljump.description: If this trick is enabled, the player may be expected to get to places by chaining walljumps together.

IBJ.description: If this trick is enabled, the player may be expected to reach higher places by placing bombs in a rhythm.

MidAirMorph.description: If this trick is enabled, the player may be expected to morph in mid-air to place bombs or get into morph tunnels.

Shinesparking.description:
If this trick is enabled, the player may be expected to do complex shinesparking maneuvers.
Just running and jumping with speedboost is not considered a shinespark. Only preserving it by crouching is.

MorphGlide.description: If this trick is enabled, the player may be expected to repeatedly morph and unmorph in the air to conserve height.

Knowledge.description: If this trick is enabled, the player may be expected to know certain hidden passageways or other lesser known facts.

Movement.description: If this trick is enabled, the player may be expected to do some tricky platforming.

ShortCharge.description: If this trick is enabled, the player may be expected to charge speedbooster sooner by various means.

DamageBoost.description: If this trick is enabled, the player may be expected to take damage in order to proceed.

DiagonalIBJ.description: If this trick is enabled, the player may be expected to gain height diagonally by placing bombs and moving in a rhythm.

Zip.description: If this trick is enabled, the player may be expected to do instantly teleport between walls, by walljumping with certain conditions.

ChargedBombJump.description: If this trick is enabled, the player may be expected to reach higher places by charging Charge Beam, morphing and releasing Charge Beam to release lots of bombs at once.

MissileLessMetroids.description: If this trick is enabled, the player may be expected to kill Metroids with only Charge Beam.
